name: Goblin HUNT with #BadaSochRAP
description:
Hunt GOBLINs with Test-Tubes Filled with Red Cassarium & Sodium Bi-Sulphate which CATCHES & ImPrisons GOBLINS. This game is MADE IN 19 hours Just for the #BadaSochGameJam. Started LATE due to my ADDICTION (Stated in the RAP).

FEATURES : Interesting LEVELs, RAP in My Voice, #BadaSoch Title Track sung by ME, About MY Addiction & How Addictions RUIn Your LIFE (Mine is Already & I'm Facing it & FIGHTING IT

Download BOTH (.exe & .pck)            

NOTE : Please STAy in ONE LEVEL after RMB Clicked to Listen Full RAP
